page.title: 19HOUSING IN CLACTON
page.content: There are a wide variety of types of housing in Clacton-on-Sea. As with most towns, there are a number of council-owned houses and bungalows, which appear in groups together. Most houses in Clacton are owner-occupied, however, although the range of architectural style is vast. Certain areas of the town are better sought after areas, and thus house prices can easily exceed Â£100,000. However, in much of Clacton an average three bedroomed house could be found for between Â£30,000 and Â£40,000. Many developments of new houses have been built by major contractors such as Wimpey, and there are a growing number of small 'starter homes' being built. Because of the large number of elderly residents in Clacton, there are a large number of bungalows in the area.
